Items.Title: Resolution concerning the increase in the annual expenditure for the Metrotech Area, Woodhaven, Fifth Avenue Association, Fashion Center, Madison Avenue, Court-Livingston-Schermerhorn, Bayside Village, and Atlantic Avenue Business Improvement Districts, and the One Hundred Sixty-fifth Street Mall and Jamaica Center Mall Special Assessment Districts, and the setting of the date, time and place for the hearing of the local law increasing the annual expenditure for such districts
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in 8 business improvement districts and 2 special assessment districts.

Items.Title: Resolution approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Communication from the Office of Management & Budget – Transfer City funds between various agencies in Fiscal Year 2017 to implement changes to the City's expense budget, pursuant to Section 107(b) of the New York City Charter (MN-1)
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Transfer City funds between various agencies in FY'17 to implement changes to the City's expense budget. (MN-1)

Items.Title: Resolution concerning the increase in the annual expenditure for the Metrotech Area, Woodhaven, Fifth Avenue Association, Fashion Center, Madison Avenue, Court-Livingston-Schermerhorn, Bayside Village, and Atlantic Avenue Business Improvement Districts, and the One Hundred Sixty-fifth Street Mall and Jamaica Center Mall Special Assessment Districts, and the setting of the date, time and place for the hearing of the local law increasing the annual expenditure for such districts
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.

Items.ActionName: P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
